1.title: START
1.description: You wake up in a dark room. There's a door to your left and a window to your right.

2.title: HALLWAY
2.description: You step into a dimly lit hallway. There's a noise coming from the end of the hallway.

3.title: NOISE SOURCE
3.description: You find the source of the noise. It's a person rummaging through a box.

4.title: CONFRONTATION
4.description: The person is startled and attacks you!
4.specialInstructions: Attempt a DEX roll to see who acts first:

5.title: STEALTH CHECK
5.description: You try to sneak past the person.
5.specialInstructions: Attempt a Stealth roll to avoid detection:

6.title: STEALTH RESULT
6.description: You successfully sneak past the person and find an exit.

7.title: SUCCESS
7.description: You sneak past the person unnoticed and continue your journey.

8.title: FAILURE
8.description: You make too much noise and the person notices you!

10.title: DARK ALLEY
10.description: You find yourself in a dark alley. Shadows move around you, making you feel uneasy.
10.specialInstructions: Attempt a Stealth roll to avoid detection:

11.description: You successfully avoid detection and move silently through the alley.

12.description: You make too much noise and attract attention. You must find a way to escape.

14.description: You reach the end of the alley and find an exit.

15.description: You run and manage to escape the alley.

20.title: ENCOUNTER
20.description: A menacing figure approaches you with a knife in hand. Prepare to defend yourself.
20.specialInstructions: Attempt a DEX roll to see who acts first:

21.description: You manage to act first. Do you want to attack or try to escape?

22.description: The attacker strikes first, and you must defend yourself.

23.description: The attacker catches you off guard and lands a blow. You take 1D6 damage.

24.description: You successfully fend off the attacker and escape unharmed.

25.description: You escape the encounter unharmed and continue your journey.

26.description: You defend yourself and manage to escape the encounter.

27.description: You take damage but manage to fend off the attacker.

28.description: You continue your journey, having survived the encounter.

30.description: You stumble into a trap and realize there's no way out. It's the end of your journey.
